dict.acceptation: 手套；棒球手套；拳击手套；

sent.orig: Release the glove box latch and remove the glove box from the glove box module.
sent.trans: 松开手套箱锁闩并从手套箱模组拆下手套箱。

sent.orig: Surgical Glove, Examination Glove, Nitrile Glove, Medical Tape, Wound Dressing, Face Mask Medical Equipment.
sent.trans: 采购产品外科手术手套，检查手套，腈手套，医疗胶带，伤口敷料，口罩医疗设备。

sent.orig: Gloves and Mittens, Socks and Stockings, Knitted Working Glove, Working Socks, Non-Slip Working Glove.
sent.trans: 采购产品手套及手套，袜子，袜子，针织工作手套，袜子，工作。

sent.orig: Remove the glove box inner door panel from the glove box outer door panel.
sent.trans: 从手套箱外门板上拆下手套箱内门板。

sent.orig: Remove the glove box inner door panel from glove box outer door panel.
sent.trans: 从手套箱内门板上拆下两个前盖螺钉，两个锁闩螺钉和一个把手螺钉。
